item.title: The Blue Rose Report w/ SMiles Lewis Guest Bill Knell
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Expert in UFOs and the paranormal, Bill Knell shared details of UFO cases, and sightings by such people as Walter Cronkite, Jackie Gleason, and JFK. During a lunch he had with Cronkite, the veteran newsman told him he witnessed a UFO shoot a blue beam at
item.itunes:summary: Expert in UFOs and the paranormal, Bill Knell shared details of UFO cases, and sightings by such people as Walter Cronkite, Jackie Gleason, and JFK. During a lunch he had with Cronkite, the veteran newsman told him he witnessed a UFO shoot a blue beam at a missile in the 1950s. The military claimed it was a test to see how the media would react to a UFO event, but Cronkite and other reporters there did not buy this explanation, Knell recounted.
item.description:
Expert in UFOs and the paranormal, Bill Knell shared details of UFO cases, and sightings by such people as Walter Cronkite, Jackie Gleason, and JFK. During a lunch he had with Cronkite, the veteran newsman told him he witnessed a UFO shoot a blue beam at a missile in the 1950s. The military claimed it was a test to see how the media would react to a UFO event, but Cronkite and other reporters there did not buy this explanation, Knell recounted.

File Download (56:55 min / 13 MB)

item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Eugenia Macer-Story has appeared on national educational television in the CBC documentary HAUNTED HOUSES, giving a brief on site demonstration of clairvoyant ghost hunting. Since first being published in UFOLOGY magazine in 1976, E. Macer-Story has been
item.itunes:summary: Eugenia Macer-Story has appeared on national educational television in the CBC documentary HAUNTED HOUSES, giving a brief on site demonstration of clairvoyant ghost hunting. Since first being published in UFOLOGY magazine in 1976, E. Macer-Story has been writing articles on the unexplained and anomalous events for a number of magazines and journals.
item.description:
Eugenia Macer-Story has appeared on national educational television in the CBC documentary HAUNTED HOUSES, giving a brief on site demonstration of clairvoyant ghost hunting. Since first being published in UFOLOGY magazine in 1976, E. Macer-Story has been writing articles on the unexplained and anomalous events for a number of magazines and journals.

item.title: The Blue Rose Report w/ SMiles Lewis Guest George Catlin, Ph.D.
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: GEORGE CATLIN, Ph.D. has devoted his professional and personal life to understanding the whole person with an emphasis on psychological health. The heart of his work is the result of research while investigating not only what could go wrong
item.itunes:summary: GEORGE CATLIN, Ph.D. has devoted his professional and personal life to understanding the whole person with an emphasis on psychological health. The heart of his work is the result of research while investigating not only what could go wrong psychologically, but also by concentrating on what could go right. He studied extensively at the University of Massachusetts where he earned his PhD in Psychology followed by an academic career as a Professor at Carthage College and Amherst. He now resides in Southern California with his wife and family. He conducts seminars and workshops around the country.
item.description:
GEORGE CATLIN, Ph.D. has devoted his professional and personal life to understanding the whole person with an emphasis on psychological health. The heart of his work is the result of research while investigating not only what could go wrong psychologically, but also by concentrating on what could go right. He studied extensively at the University of Massachusetts where he earned his PhD in Psychology followed by an academic career as a Professor at Carthage College and Amherst. He now resides in Southern California with his wife and family. He conducts seminars and workshops around the country.

item.title: The Blue Rose Report w/ SMiles Lewis Guest Walter Bosley
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Walter Bosley is a world traveling author and explorer of extraordinary phenomena. He has served as a counterintelligence specialist during the final years of the Cold War for the FBI and served as a Special Agent with the Air Force Office of Special
item.itunes:summary: Walter Bosley is a world traveling author and explorer of extraordinary phenomena. He has served as a counterintelligence specialist during the final years of the Cold War for the FBI and served as a Special Agent with the Air Force Office of Special Investigations running counterespionage operations. For the past seven years, Walter has been a personal security and antiterrorism consultant for corporate and private clients around the world. In addition, he founded The Lost Continent Library Publishing Company, a small press that specializes in classic adventure fiction, including his own works under the pseudonym E.A. Guest.
item.description:
Walter Bosley is a world traveling author and explorer of extraordinary phenomena. He has served as a counterintelligence specialist during the final years of the Cold War for the FBI and served as a Special Agent with the Air Force Office of Special Investigations running counterespionage operations. For the past seven years, Walter has been a personal security and antiterrorism consultant for corporate and private clients around the world. In addition, he founded The Lost Continent Library Publishing Company, a small press that specializes in classic adventure fiction, including his own works under the pseudonym E.A. Guest.

item.itunes:summary: Writer, Researcher and Radio Host. Past Assistant Editor of The Excluded Middle magazine, he has written for Magickal Blend, FATE, E.L.F. Infested Spaces and other publications. He hosted the Cartoon Pleroma radioshow for several years and recently made his triumphant return to radio with Out The Rabbit Hole, his new weekly radioshow broadcasting live every Friday afternnoon on KUCI 88.9 fm in Irvine, California.
item.description:
Writer, Researcher and Radio Host. Past Assistant Editor of The Excluded Middle magazine, he has written for Magickal Blend, FATE, E.L.F. Infested Spaces and other publications. He hosted the Cartoon Pleroma radioshow for several years and recently made his triumphant return to radio with Out The Rabbit Hole, his new weekly radioshow broadcasting live every Friday afternnoon on KUCI 88.9 fm in Irvine, California.

item.title: The Blue Rose Report w/ SMiles Lewis: CryptoZoology Surprise
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Last nights show was unscripted and very FUN! Friend and co-conspirator Craig York called in and we began discussing Cryptozoology and anomalous animal behaviors in the news. We discussed the increase in public awareness of cryptozoology and the medias
item.itunes:summary: Last nights show was unscripted and very FUN! Friend and co-conspirator Craig York called in and we began discussing Cryptozoology and anomalous animal behaviors in the news. We discussed the increase in public awareness of cryptozoology and the medias playing up of animal news stories. We careened across continents discussing Central Texas cougar sightings, giant insect nests, Indian elephant rampages and rice beer (1998/99 and 2005/06), psychotic American raccoon gangs, manic monkeys, Texas Bigfoot & Ghost Lights and much more!
item.description:
Last nights show was unscripted and very FUN! Friend and co-conspirator Craig York called in and we began discussing Cryptozoology and anomalous animal behaviors in the news. We discussed the increase in public awareness of cryptozoology and the medias playing up of animal news stories. We careened across continents discussing Central Texas cougar sightings, giant insect nests, Indian elephant rampages and rice beer (1998/99 and 2005/06), psychotic American raccoon gangs, manic monkeys, Texas Bigfoot & Ghost Lights and much more!

File Download (61:14 min / 14 MB)

item.title: The Blue Rose Report w/ SMiles Lewis: Guest Adam Gorightly
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: A self-described crackpot historian, Adam Gorightly is the author of The Shadow Over Santa Susana Black Magic, Mind Control, and The Manson Family Mythos and The Prankster and The Conspiracy The Story of Kerry Thornley and How He Met Oswald and Inspired
item.itunes:summary: A self-described crackpot historian, Adam Gorightly is the author of The Shadow Over Santa Susana Black Magic, Mind Control, and The Manson Family Mythos and The Prankster and The Conspiracy The Story of Kerry Thornley and How He Met Oswald and Inspired the Counterculture. Adam has been a guest on radio talk shows across the U.S. and Canada and his articles have appeared in numerous publications such as The Excluded Middle, UFO Magazine, Paranoia and SteamShovel Press.
item.description:
A self-described crackpot historian, Adam Gorightly is the author of The Shadow Over Santa Susana Black Magic, Mind Control, and The Manson Family Mythos and The Prankster and The Conspiracy The Story of Kerry Thornley and How He Met Oswald and Inspired the Counterculture. Adam has been a guest on radio talk shows across the U.S. and Canada and his articles have appeared in numerous publications such as The Excluded Middle, UFO Magazine, Paranoia and SteamShovel Press.

item.itunes:summary: My first guest on The Blue Rose Report will be Parapolitical Artist, Researcher and Writer, Mack White. He is an old friend of mine and fellow local Central Texas Kook. We share many areas of interest and have collaborated on such projects as the Post-911 Austin newspaper, The Austin Para Times.
item.description:
My first guest on The Blue Rose Report will be Parapolitical Artist, Researcher and Writer, Mack White. He is an old friend of mine and fellow local Central Texas Kook. We share many areas of interest and have collaborated on such projects as the Post-911 Austin newspaper, The Austin Para Times.
